name: space-data-network
description: Space Data Network - Decentralized peer-to-peer network for space situational awareness data

scripts.test: npm run test:go && npm run test:js
scripts.stress: npm run stress:go && npm run stress:js
scripts.stress:js: cd sdn-js && npx vitest run --config vitest.stress.config.ts
scripts.server:build: cd sdn-server && go build -o bin/spacedatanetwork ./cmd/spacedatanetwork && go build -o bin/spacedatanetwork-edge ./cmd/spacedatanetwork-edge
scripts.desktop: test -d desktop/node_modules || (echo 'Desktop dependencies not installed. Run: npm run install:desktop' && exit 1) && npm run webui:build && npm --prefix desktop start
scripts.desktop:build: cd desktop && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.install:all: npm run install:js && npm run install:desktop && npm run install:webui
scripts.webui: IPFS=./desktop/node_modules/kubo/kubo/ipfs && $IPFS config --json API.HTTPHeaders.Access-Control-Allow-Origin '["http://localhost:3117", "http://127.0.0.1:5001", "https://webui.ipfs.io"]' && $IPFS config --json API.HTTPHeaders.Access-Control-Allow-Methods '["PUT", "POST"]' && $IPFS daemon & until curl -s -o /dev/null http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/v0/version -X POST; do sleep 1; done && echo 'IPFS daemon ready' && PORT=3117 npm --prefix webui start

author: Space Data Network
